text:
RELIGION

Arulmigu Ranganathaswamy Temple, Srirangam: Thai car festival, Namperumal purappadu from kannadi arai, 4.30 a.m.; reaching vagana mandapam, 4.45 a.m.; purappadu in Karpaga Virutcham, 5.15 a.m.; purappadu in pallakku, 7.30 a.m.; reaching Sukkaravarthoppu Asthana mandapam, 11 a.m.; purappadu from the mandapam, 5 p.m.; reaching Yanai vagana mandapam, 5.45 p.m.; purappadu in Yanai vaganam, 8 p.m.; reaching kannadi arai, 9.45 p.m.

Arulmigu Mariamman Temple, Samayapuram: Thai poosam festival, Amman thiruveedhi ula in pallakku, 10 a.m.; abishekam, 5 p.m.; maha deeparadhana, 7 p.m.; Amman thiruveedhi ula in Mara Yanai vaganam, 8 p.m.; reaching sanctum sanctorum, 9 p.m.

Sri Sundaravalli-Sri Velkandanathar Temple : Maha kumbabishekam, Vaikal Mettu Street, Palakkarai, 9.45 a.m.; maha abishekam, 4.30 p.m.; thirukalyana utsavam, 6 p.m.; Swamy thiruveedhi ula, 8 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha : Parayana goshti procession, South Gate, Srirangam, 5.30 a.m.; Sri Vishnu Sahasranama parayanam, Sri Venugopalan Sannidhi, Ranganathapuram, Srirangam, 6 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam : Sri Rama Nama parayanam, 20, VII Cross Sundar Nagar, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

Seethalakshmi Ramaswami College : Seminar on Wonders of medicinal plants and pest management, M.Jayanthi, principal, inaugurates, 10 a.m.; Department of Physics: Seminar on ‘Ecstasies in quantum, crystal and neutrino physics,’ 10 a.m.; Youth Forum and PACE Academy: Training programme for TNPSC group II exams, Nandhakumar, Joint Commissioner of Income Tax, Tiruchi, chief guest, 10 a.m.

Holy Cross College : Seminar on Nature in Tamil Christian Literature, Jesuin Francis, principal, presides, 9.30 a.m.

K.Ramakrishnan College of Engineering : Inauguration of ICTACT and faculty development programme on mobile application development, 10 a.m.

Kongunadu College of Engineering and Technology : Seminar on Digital locker, 5.30 p.m.

Sharon, JCI Tiruchi Excel, Lions Club of Tiruchi Karumandapam and Joseph Eye Hospital : Free eye screening camp, R.C.Primary School, Somrasampettai, 10 a.m.

Department of Information and Public Relations : Government exhibition, St.John’s Vestry Anglo Indian Higher Secondary School grounds, 4 p.m.

Shrimati Indira Gandhi College : Sports Day, Shanthi Soundarajan, chief guest, 3.30 p.m.

Abirami Driving School : Inauguration of training track, Poonampalayam, 9 a.m.
title: tiruchi today
